title: Bangladesh Medical
description: This is a Medical Services Website.Build With React,Firebase, Bootstrap. Users have to register/login in the websites.Users are able to purchase a medical services.

title: Ahmed Drones
description: It is a Drone Selling Website. Here you get different Dashboard (Users and Admin).Users can purchase products by register/login into the website and also can cancel their orders.Users are able to give reviews on websites and Admin can manage full websites such as Manage Orders, Manage Products, Make Admin, etc

title: Ahmed Travels
description: This is a Travels/Tourism Website.Build With React, Firebase, MongoDB, Bootstrap, React Hook From etc.Users have to register/login in the websites to purchase a tour package.The login users are able to manage his/her ordered tour packages.Admin can manage everything such as approve/delete users orders.
